name: Fishing Maniacs (TD)
description: Tower defense! Fishing? Movable units?? 10-20 hours of gameplay! S, M, L, XL, XXL maps! 10.000+ fish in 100's of waves! 6 unique fishermen and 17 types of fish! 14 levels (tiny to GIGANTIC)! Bombs, Chainsaws, Machine Guns, Poisons, Tesla coils..! Yes, Fishing Maniacs has all that!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, or newer Processor: 1 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6000 Series Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, or newer Processor: 3 Ghz or faster Memory: 6 GB RAM Storage: 2 GB available space
